title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: members, contributors, leaders pledge make participation community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, body size, visible invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity expression, level experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, caste, color, religion, sexual identity orientation. pledge act interact ways contribute open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, healthy community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Examples behavior contributes positive environment community include: Demonstrating empathy kindness toward people respectful differing opinions, viewpoints, experiences Giving gracefully accepting constructive feedback Accepting responsibility apologizing affected mistakes, learning experience Focusing best just us individuals, overall community Examples unacceptable behavior include: use sexualized language imagery, sexual attention advances kind Trolling, insulting derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others‚Äô private information, physical email address, without explicit permission conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders responsible clarifying enforcing standards acceptable behavior take appropriate fair corrective action response behavior deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful. Community leaders right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, communicate reasons moderation decisions appropriate.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct applies within community spaces, also applies individual officially representing community public spaces. Examples representing community include using official e-mail address, posting via official social media account, acting appointed representative online offline event.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Instances abusive, harassing, otherwise unacceptable behavior may reported community leaders responsible enforcement andrewallenbruce@gmail.com. complaints reviewed investigated promptly fairly. community leaders obligated respect privacy security reporter incident.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community leaders follow Community Impact Guidelines determining consequences action deem violation Code Conduct:

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Use inappropriate language behavior deemed unprofessional unwelcome community. Consequence: private, written warning community leaders, providing clarity around nature violation explanation behavior inappropriate. public apology may requested.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: violation single incident series actions. Consequence: warning consequences continued behavior. interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, specified period time. includes avoiding interactions community spaces well external channels like social media. Violating terms may lead temporary permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: serious violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior. Consequence: temporary ban sort interaction public communication community specified period time. public private interaction people involved, including unsolicited interaction enforcing Code Conduct, allowed period. Violating terms may lead permanent ban.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Community Impact: Demonstrating pattern violation community standards, including sustained inappropriate behavior, harassment individual, aggression toward disparagement classes individuals. Consequence: permanent ban sort public interaction within community.

title: Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 2.1, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/2/1/code_of_conduct.html. Community Impact Guidelines inspired [Mozilla‚Äôs code conduct enforcement ladder][https://github.com/mozilla/inclusion]. answers common questions code conduct, see FAQ https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq. Translations available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/translations.

what: arktax: NUCC Provider Taxonomy Codesets ‚Äî arktax-package
title: arktax: NUCC Provider Taxonomy Codesets ‚Äî arktax-package
text: Programmatic interface NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy Code Set, including raw codesets 2009 present, various different forms data, Medicare specialty--taxonomy crosswalk dataset.

title: arktax: NUCC Provider Taxonomy Codesets ‚Äî arktax-package
text: Maintainer: Andrew Allen Bruce andrewallenbruce@gmail.com [copyright holder]

title: Coerce vector to <date> class ‚Äî as_date
text: x vector ... additional arguments fmt <chr> format; default "%Y-%m-%d"

title: Medicare Specialty Crosswalk Footnotes ‚Äî crosswalk_footnotes
text: taxonomy_code <chr>  Health Care Provider Taxonomy code, unique alphanumeric code, ten characters length specialty_code <chr>  Medicare Specialty Code, alphanumeric code, two characters length

title: Medicare Specialty Crosswalk Footnotes ‚Äî crosswalk_footnotes
code: crosswalk_footnotes(taxonomy_code = "251E00000X") #> # A tibble: 2 √ó 3 #>   taxonomy_code specialty_code footnote                                          #>   <chr>         <chr>          <glue>                                            #> 1 251E00000X    A4             (11) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶ #> 2 251E00000X    A4             (11) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶  crosswalk_footnotes(specialty_code = "A0") #> # A tibble: 22 √ó 3 #>    taxonomy_code specialty_code footnote                                         #>    <chr>         <chr>          <glue>                                           #>  1 282N00000X    A0             (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶ #>  2 282N00000X    A0             (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶ #>  3 282NC2000X    A0             (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶ #>  4 282E00000X    A0             (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶ #>  5 283Q00000X    A0             (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶ #>  6 283X00000X    A0             (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶ #>  7 282N00000X    A0             (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶ #>  8 273100000X    A0             (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶ #>  9 276400000X    A0             (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶ #> 10 281P00000X    A0             (7) Medicare specialty code designation is for ‚Ä¶ #> # ‚Ñπ 12 more rows

title: Raw Crosswalk File ‚Äî crosswalk_raw

title: Raw Crosswalk File ‚Äî crosswalk_raw
code: crosswalk_raw(taxonomy_code = "103T00000X") #> # A tibble: 1 √ó 6 #>   taxonomy_code taxonomy_description        specialty_code specialty_description #>   <chr>         <chr>                       <chr>          <chr>                 #> 1 103T00000X    Behavioral Health & Social‚Ä¶ 62             Psychologist, Clinic‚Ä¶ #> # ‚Ñπ 2 more variables: footnote <chr>, footnote_description <chr>  head(crosswalk_raw(), 10) #> # A tibble: 10 √ó 6 #>    taxonomy_code taxonomy_description       specialty_code specialty_description #>    <chr>         <chr>                      <chr>          <chr>                 #>  1 101YM0800X    NA                         E2             Mental Health Counse‚Ä¶ #>  2 101YP2500X    NA                         E2             Licensed Professiona‚Ä¶ #>  3 103T00000X    Behavioral Health & Socia‚Ä¶ 62             Psychologist, Clinic‚Ä¶ #>  4 103TA0400X    Behavioral Health & Socia‚Ä¶ 62             Psychologist, Clinic‚Ä¶ #>  5 103TA0700X    Behavioral Health & Socia‚Ä¶ 62             Psychologist, Clinic‚Ä¶ #>  6 103TB0200X    Behavioral Health & Socia‚Ä¶ 62             Psychologist, Clinic‚Ä¶ #>  7 103TC0700X    Behavioral Health & Socia‚Ä¶ 62             Psychologist, Clinic‚Ä¶ #>  8 103TC0700X    Behavioral Health & Socia‚Ä¶ 68             Psychologist, Clinic‚Ä¶ #>  9 103TC1900X    Behavioral Health & Socia‚Ä¶ 62             Psychologist, Clinic‚Ä¶ #> 10 103TC2200X    Behavioral Health & Socia‚Ä¶ 62             Psychologist, Clinic‚Ä¶ #> # ‚Ñπ 2 more variables: footnote <chr>, footnote_description <chr>

title: Taxonomy - Medicare Specialty Crosswalk ‚Äî crosswalk_taxonomy
text: taxonomy_code <chr>  Health Care Provider Taxonomy code, unique alphanumeric code, ten characters length specialty_code <chr>  Medicare Specialty Code, alphanumeric code, two characters length

title: Taxonomy - Medicare Specialty Crosswalk ‚Äî crosswalk_taxonomy
code: crosswalk_taxonomy(taxonomy_code = "103T00000X") #> # A tibble: 1 √ó 4 #>   taxonomy_code taxonomy_description        specialty_code specialty_description #>   <chr>         <chr>                       <chr>          <chr>                 #> 1 103T00000X    Behavioral Health & Social‚Ä¶ 62             Psychologist, Clinic‚Ä¶  crosswalk_taxonomy(taxonomy_code = c("101YM0800X", "101YP2500X")) #> # A tibble: 2 √ó 4 #>   taxonomy_code taxonomy_description specialty_code specialty_description        #>   <chr>         <chr>                <chr>          <chr>                        #> 1 101YM0800X    NA                   E2             Mental Health Counselor      #> 2 101YP2500X    NA                   E2             Licensed Professional Couns‚Ä¶

title: Taxonomy Change Log ‚Äî taxonomy_changelog
text: taxonomy_code <chr>  Health Care Provider Taxonomy code, unique alphanumeric code, ten characters length

title: Taxonomy Change Log ‚Äî taxonomy_changelog
code: taxonomy_changelog(taxonomy_code = "103GC0700X") #> # A tibble: 1 √ó 4 #>   code       date       change      details        #>   <chr>      <date>     <ord>       <chr>          #> 1 103GC0700X 2007-01-01 deactivated use 103G00000X  taxonomy_changelog(taxonomy_code = "103G00000X") #> # A tibble: 2 √ó 4 #>   code       date       change   details    #>   <chr>      <date>     <ord>    <chr>      #> 1 103G00000X 2007-01-01 modified title      #> 2 103G00000X 2019-01-01 modified definition

title: Taxonomy Hierarchy ‚Äî taxonomy_hierarchy
text: taxonomy_code <chr>  Health Care Provider Taxonomy code, unique alphanumeric code, ten characters length taxonomy_level <chr>  Taxonomy level; options ". Section", "II. Grouping", "III. Classification" "IV. Specialization" taxonomy_title <chr>  Taxonomy level title

title: Taxonomy Hierarchy ‚Äî taxonomy_hierarchy
code: taxonomy_hierarchy(taxonomy_code = "101Y00000X") #> # A tibble: 3 √ó 3 #>   taxonomy_code taxonomy_level      taxonomy_level_title                         #>   <chr>         <ord>               <chr>                                        #> 1 101Y00000X    I. Section          Individual                                   #> 2 101Y00000X    II. Grouping        Behavioral Health & Social Service Providers #> 3 101Y00000X    III.
